events.name: Why Satan? Led by: Minister Ren√© Grigori
events.description: The Temple services are meant as live discussions rather than lectures, so these will not be recorded to respect everyone's privacy when participating. However, the Minister's introduction to the discussion will be recorded for future posting on TSTTV.

events.name: After Services Activities: Dungeons and Dragons
events.description: Join Kaelea Kae for an adventure through a homebrew campaign that will prove memorable for players and viewers alike. We will be rolling lots of dice, cracking a bunch of jokes, telling some stories, and, most importantly, having fun.

events.name: After Services Activities: Satanic Sober Faction
events.description: TST Sober Faction will be hosting special meetings after weekly services such as Sober Book club hosted by Priest Joe Dee, Seven Ritual Workshop hosted by Reverend Jon Eldritch, & free talk Q&A sessions hosted by all of Sober Faction Council. Heal Thyself, Hail Thyself! Sobriety Without Superstition.

events.name: After Services Activities: Satanic Writers Circle
events.description: Join Jack and Ada for our Satanic Writers Circle. Today we will follow up on projects we are all working on and share our work.

events.name: Whimsical Blasphemy: Music and Videos
events.description: Live from Salem, join Mercy Maelica for music and videos!

events.name: After Services Activities: Dark Arts and Crafts
events.description: Join Satan's Craft Room & Satanic artists for a very chill craft and chat session.
